reports.title: ðŸ¦ Twitter Dashboard ðŸ¦
reports.query: https://global-uploads.webflow.com/5e157548d6f7910beea4e2d6/6304a4144b96900853d82d9b_Twitter-Logo-2010.png

reports.title: Number for Fake News Over Time
reports.query:
MATCH(f:Fake)
WITH Date(f.timestamp) as Timestamp, Count(f) as Tweets
ORDER BY Timestamp
RETURN Timestamp, Tweets

reports.title: List of Fake Tweets
Number of Fake News
reports.query:
Match(n:Tweet)
Return n.label as Label, Count(n) as `Number of Tweets`

reports.title: Number of Fake Tweets
reports.query:
MATCH(n:Fake)
Return count(n)

reports.title: Number of times Fake Tweet is retweeted
reports.query:
Match(n:Fake)
Return SUM(n.retweetCount)

reports.title: Fake News Gauge
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Fake)
WITH count(f) as cf
MATCH(n:Tweet)
RETURN toFloat(cf) / toFloat(count(n)) * 100

MATCH(u:User)
MATCH p = (u)-[:Tweeted]->(n:Fake)
RETURN u.username AS Username, count(n) as `Count of Fake Tweets`
ORDER BY count(n) DESC

MATCH (n:`Tweet`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`id`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`id` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Network Graph
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Tweet)
MATCH p = (n)-[*..3]-()
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n,p

reports.title: Tweet Text
reports.query:
Match(n:Tweet)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
return n.text

reports.title: Tweet Information
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Tweet)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n.id As Id, n.url AS Url , CASE WHEN n.label = 0 THEN "Real" ELSE "Fake" END as Label, n.likeCount as `Like Count`

reports.title: Total Retweet Outreach
reports.query:
MATCH p = (n:Tweet)<-[:Quoted]-(q)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n.retweetCount + SUM(q.retweetCount)

reports.title: Total Reply Outreach
reports.query:
MATCH p = (n:Tweet)<-[:Quoted]-(q)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n.replyCount + SUM(q.replyCount)

reports.title: Total Quote Outreach
reports.query:
MATCH p = (n:Tweet)<-[:Quoted]-(q)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n.quoteCount + SUM(q.quoteCount)

reports.title: Total Like Outreach
reports.query:
MATCH p = (n:Tweet)<-[:Quoted]-(q)
WHERE n.id = $neodash_tweet_id 
RETURN n.likeCount + sum(q.likeCount)

MATCH (n:`User`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`username`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`username` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Number of Tweets
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t:Tweet)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
WITH count(t) as ct
MATCH q=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(f:Fake)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
RETURN count(f) as `Number of Fake Tweets`, ct as `Number of Tweets`

reports.title: Fake Tweets Gauge
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t:Tweet)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
WITH count(t) as ct
MATCH q=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(f:Fake)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
RETURN toFloat(count(f)) / toFloat(ct) * 100

reports.title: Total Replys
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t)
RETURN sum(t.replyCount)

reports.title: Total Likes
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
RETURN sum(t.likeCount)

reports.title: Total Quotes
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t)
RETURN sum(t.quoteCount)

reports.title: Total Retweets
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
MATCH p=(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t)
RETURN sum(t.retweetCount)

reports.title: Network Graphs
reports.query:
Match(u:User)
MATCH p=(u)-[*]-()
where u.username = $neodash_user_username
RETURN u,p

MATCH(u:User)
MATCH p =(u)-[:Tweeted]->(t)
WHERE u.username = $neodash_user_username
RETURN t.id as Id, t.url as Url, CASE WHEN t.label = 0 THEN "Real" ELSE "Fake" END as Label
ORDER BY t.label DESC
